评论详情: Love em. Super comfortable.  Favorite shoes. Bought 1/2 size big, fits perfectly. I'm usually a 10 1/2, Bought size 11.
Own some prios, these run a little smaller but still fit. Enjoy these for leg day.

评论概述: Great fit and fun to run in
评论详情: Great fit and fun to run in

评论概述: Wow! Stunned! Should be zero stars!
评论详情: I looked to have a new pair of shoes and they came packaged looking USED! With dirt or something on the soles of the shoe when the person wore them.  This is a first for me and I am very disappointed with Xero or Amazon to try to pass on a pair of used shoes as new.  I have been wanting these shoes for a while and now I have second thoughts on if I should try to buy another pair.  The ratings have be very good and I had confidence with Xero, but now I am hesitant to make the purchase.

评论概述: The most uncomfortable pair of shoes.
评论详情: These shoes are incredibly uncomfortable. The company has really poor customer service. I do not recommend.
Arrived in great condition
great shoe for cheer leading
It is not relaxed and big as on the picture. Its really tight and short
Amazingly comfortable and fit perfectly. Don't hesitate to buy this shoe you gotta invest in your foot health.

评论概述: Just as good as the HFS I
评论详情: Great fit. Feel just as good as the HFS I right out of the box.  Also nice aggressive sole provides good grip. Definitely plan to buy these again.

I just purchased my second pair. There was a lot of adjustment that I had to do body wise foot wise calf wise with the first pair but it was all worth it. My feet are fixed. My posture is fixed. I walk correctly now I really like these shoes. I probably wear them for years.  They’re high-quality the only con I have is the bottoms wear out quicker than I expected.

Bought these a little over a year and haven't worn them that much since I only really wear in summertime. Sole of both sides and other places already breaking down. Might look into another brand that last longer.
the lightest and comfortable shoe i have ever worn

Utilizing my customary shoe size produced a comfortable fit.  My plan is to improve foot health by using these shoes for training and hopefully everyday wear as well.  Running will be minimal, but a break-in plan is still a good idea to adapt to the new foot environment.  So far, so good.

I’m uncertain asto the source of ineptitude but I returned these shoes hoping to just get the next size up but there’s no “exchange “ option so I had to return them, get my Amazon account refunded and if that EVER happens order another pair but I may just checkout vivo instead because this is ridiculous. I’ve never worn larger than an 11 but these were too short and my big toes were pressing hard against them.

评论概述: Not the best looking - Not great for the price
评论详情: For this price, I have to say I expected more. Wide look isn't my favorite and feels much like the cheaper brands. Trying some other shoes, but thinking these will most probably be returned.
I was really looking for a shoe with wide toe area and these did that.  Although these run small in length so I would recommend ordering a size larger.

Barefoot shoes are usually assumed to have wide toe box region to allow the toes to naturally spread out. These shoes have a narrow toe box region just like regular shoes.  The Amazon brand, Whitin have a much wider toe box region.

评论概述: Xero is simply the BEST shoe on the market today!
评论详情: These shoes are 100% mind blowing yall! This purchase is a no brainer! Don’t even hesitate! This is your sign! I’m someone who was totally skeptical, and I have been converted and convinced! These shoes made my back feel better and more balanced, less fatigue, less stress on my neck and spine. Can’t say enough about how great these shows are! Zero drop tech is the way to go! I just 100% love them! Xero HFS 2 was a blind buy for me and I will never wear anything else, period. You’ve made a believer outta me!

评论概述: I Like These Shoes...but they run really small
评论详情: Had to return/order multiple shoes.  My size is a 10. Ordered a size 10. They were small.  Ordered 10.5.  They were small. Ordered 11, they're small but functional. I reality, I probably could wear a size 12 in these shoes. They're basically women's sized shoes. You can take out the insoles to make them a little roomier.

Their size guide is different from the actual size provided in the shoe box.  Now I'm stuck with a pair of shoes that are too long and uncomfortable to run in simply because they can't bother to provide an accurate size guide.

Have been wearing these shoes about 3 months. Love the shoes. Wish I would have learned about wide toe box shoes years ago. Price is on the high end and they run a little small for me on the size chart.

评论概述: These are the most comfortable shoes !!
评论详情: Beautiful shoes and very comfortable 😊 I love everything about them. Very happy with the purchase ❤️❤️❤️❤️ thank you!

评论概述: For "uncomfortable" shoes, these are incredibly comfortable!
评论详情: I bought these as a multi-purpose shoe for walking to-and-from every day tasks in the city and for weightlifting. Just altered my workouts for more endurance and stamina, rather than the previous focus of power and strength.  Incredibly comfortable shoes, despite the founder's YouTube commercial suggesting that they're uncomfortable and explaining why they will be uncomfortable to begin with.  Yes, for the first few days, there were some minor aches and pains in the feet, but that's from all of those years of not adequately using all of those smaller muscles, joint, and ligaments in the foot and ankle area from the pillow-plush cushioned shoes I've bought over the years.  After naturally adjusting my stride, pace, and step cadence walking, I feel much more stable and secure to the earth than previously. If you're in martial arts or foot-heavy sports, you'd definitely appreciate that aspect.
I normally wear a size 11 US. These are more like a size 10.5 US. Bought these on prime day and now they are $30 more without the opportunity to exchange them. Also they are made in China.
These Xero shoes are the best that has happen to my feet in a long time. Would like to see pricing more in line with the company’s pricing. Awesome🕊️

评论概述: Too Tight, evern when a full size larger
评论详情: I ordered a pair that was 1/2 a size larger than what I wear, sent them back. Then I got a full size larger and they still did not fit. I got my feet in them, so I guess they fit, but they were way to tight and uncomfortable. The top of my feet and the toes felt cramped, so I am returning a second pair of these shoes.  A doctor suggested I get these and said it is her #1 suggestion for shoes, but the toe box is way too tight, especially compared to the Whitin shoes I am wearing right now. I figured since these were triple the price that they would be even better. Boy was I wrong.  I guess I'll go find another pair of the Whitin shoes, as they are much more comfortable than these shoes and 1/3 of the price.
Different feel more natural feeling like walking around barefooted.

Been rocking the Prios for over 2 years now and decided to give these a shot. The soles feel a lot thicker than the prios, which isn't a bad thing. The issue I had was none of the sizes fit me. I started with an 11.5, which I wore in the Prio, too small. Bought a size 12 and it was barely any bigger. Then bought a 12.5 and they're too big. Hopefully this problem is specific to me so other people can enjoy them cause they're cool shoes. But looks like the HFS isn't for me.
The shoelaces are too short to properly tie , definitely cannot do a double knot. I feel like shoes this expensive you shouldn't have to go out my new shoelaces or deal with the hassle of that.
Overall good shoe, it provides wide toe box and zero degree angle on foot, for best balance conditioning.  Very minimalist.  A little light on cushion, but a great light exercise shoe.
Comfortable, good fit. It might work better as a gym, cross training shoe or pickle all shoe. Will try it for some short runs first.

评论概述: Finally shoes that help my husband!
评论详情: My husband has really awkward arched feet and these actually help him! They’re light which he also loves, and he said the cushion is perfect. You cannot beat that price either! Will absolutely be purchasing again!
Too expensive for what it's worth

评论概述: The best outdoor martial arts shoes money can buy.
评论详情: They are outdoor shoes unlike SM-IIs but I would choose these over SM-II even for indoor. I bought several pairs, for training and for daily wear. They are truly amazing!

My review after wearing them 3-4x a week for a little under 2 years:  Xero's have been my new shoe of choice after coming from New Balance Minimus (sorry NB) as I've been looking for a shoe with a wide toe box and has a low drop.  I've used these shoes for group fitness classes and working out solo. Exercises include: - Box jumps - Deadlifts - Bench pressing - Squats  When it comes to running, these shoes are a no go. They hurt my feet on solid concrete and on trails after 2 minutes. For those instances, I choose Asics as they also have a wider toe box.  Overall, they've lasted quite a while and I'd give them two thumbs up. My 2 gripes though would be price and design. They are pricey and out of range for some who may not be able to afford or want to buy shoes that are over $100 dollars. Also, it'd be great if Xero updated their design and color ways. Yes, aesthetics are subjective but IMO, they aren't very good looking shoes. But I purchased them so what does that say about me? Lol!  I am a fan of Xero but in order to compete with the other brands out there, your designs need to 'wow' your audience. Other than that, it's a solid choice for working out in.

评论概述: Flat and light but gave me calf pain
评论详情: Been running in flats for decades and I bought these because my Altra Vanish-R were discontinued. Altras were exceptionally flat with very little cushioning. The Xero's are similarly flat and the sole is a bit more durable than the Altra's. I think overall the materials are more durable too. But after a week or so I developed really bad calf pain and had to stop using them. A few months later I switched back to the Xero's for a few days and the calf pain came right back. All done.

Great shoes, but the quality is horrible. This is my second pair and none have lasted longer then 6 months with daily use. Either the glue from the sole lets loose, or there will come holes in the (cheap) material. Hope to find some similar shoes with higher quality materials

I really wanted to like this shoe, but the toe box is not nearly as wide as vivobarefoot or Lems, even though xero advertises their shoes as having a wide toe box, it is only slightly wider than normal shoes. Xero is perfect for people who are just switching over to barefoot shoes, not for those who have already been barefoot for a while. Even though I took out the inner sole cushion, these shoes still don’t offer that close to the ground feel. The sole is just too thick. These shoes just feel like normal athletic shoes to be honest.

I have the previous version of this shoe as well. Both run small in size. Get a 1/2 size bigger than you normally would. The HFS II is very different from the original. Do *NOT* think this is an upgraded or improved or better shoe than the original. It's night and day. The original is an outstanding BAREFOOT running shoe with a very thin sole through which your feet can actually feel the surface of the ground. I love running in those shoes but they are tiresome walking around in all day for hiking or city walking.  The opposite is true with the HFS II. The sole is clearly stiffer, possibly slightly thicker too. It's an awesome shoe for the whole day for minor hiking, city walking, going to work or going out. It's also dressy enough to use for social events. But for running, it's a big NO for me because there's no barefoot feel to them. IMO...

评论概述: Disappointed. Does not have a wide toe box......
评论详情: unless you are maybe coming from standard athletic shoes. I've been wearing Altra "original foot shape" shoes or Vivobarefoot shoes for years.  Xero shoes have a much narrower toe box which defeats the whole purpose for me. These xero's also run small, so if you don't care about the toe box plan on going up in size.
Even though the marketing of this shoe is based on the lightweight and ergo dynamic design, they are not for people with wide feet.
Great shoe while it lasted but with very light wear it started falling apart. I contacted xero and they refuse to warranty them. 120 bucks and held up for about 7 months, hard pass on these.
A couple weeks of wear and the sole of the shoe is coming off

Your feet will love the open toe box and quality construction, but they almost zero padding.  It’s like a cardboard insert.  I do cardio on gym treadmills and stairs and these are almost painful to run in.  With the exception of a quality lifting shoe, their lack of padding does not provide a comfortable foot impact on almost any surface.

These running shoes just broke during my very first use. Two out of four upper laces supports broke and made the shoes useless.  I was ver surprised but a close revision of the item reveals that materials and manufacturing is weak and cheap. Had to return the items

I wear my Xeros almost every day and I love them. The only time I don’t wear them is when it rains because my feet get wet instantly and for road running. Although I wear zero drop shoes for running, I prefer having slightly more cushion (stack height) when on the street. That said, these shoes are so agile and comfortable. They are one of the only shoes (even amongst minimalist/zero drop footwear) that actually provide my toes with enough room. These shoes really shine in the gym, allowing my feet to function properly when performing compound movements. The outsole is nice and grippy, so these shoes are even great for hiking. I will keep buying these shoes as long as they make them.  All in all, these shoes fit true to size, look great, feel great, and are perfect for anyone looking for a shoe that ACTUALLY fits a human foot.
For a barefoot shoe, the toe box could be a lot wider

Xero are back in form with this excellent shoe. its light with good support but it still feels like a barefoot shoe. I feel they got the balance just right on this one.. if you want it to be 'more barefoot' then take out the inner sole. this makes a big shift in the feel you get back when running. I love this shoe and the sole is going to last forever. it's very well made. I'm a fan of this brand and not everything they make is perfect but this one is their best shoe in my opinion.
I've used Xero shoes before, and like before these are great.  A disk in my back is messed up from many years of trucking, and these help make walking easier.

评论概述: They cut back on the big toe
评论详情: The big toe is getting crushed. I can’t believe they took away the splay. Make sure you can return it if you try it. DISAPPOINTED!

I still don't get why manufacturers do this with sizes. I'm a true 8.5 and ordered a 8.5 and although they fit they fit true to size BUT I have no rooms to wiggle my toes. The shoe fits like a sock ZERO room to properly extend your toes. Go half size or a size bigger if you're gonna purchase these.

Comfortable and very flexible, not cheaply made. No issue breaking them in, no rubbing on my heels/ankles, never caused a blister. I wanted a shoe as close to barefoot as possible and these are great with and without thin socks. Not sweaty in hot weather. Not waterproof at all in rain/puddles, no traction on ice, BUT stay surprisingly dry in powder snow. Only had them fail to dry out overnight a couple times. After 6+ months of daily use I am probably going to replace the insole soon but the shoes only have mild wear on the treads and seem to be in it for the long haul.  I am a woman with wide feet but I wear a mens 8.5 in these and they’re a great width.  Totally going to be a loyal customer to this brand!

The zero heel drop shoes are life changing. Never had terrible back problems, but always had some tightness. It’s all gone now! Seriously, my posture is excellent, my calves and my Achilles tendon have gotten a lot stronger. My balance is a lot better.
Good quality and comfortable.

Shoes look contoured for feet (as far as toe shaped). Maybe this is the reason that they seem to run small. Definately use the "Try Before you Buy" feature if available. I'm going to return these and get a size larger than 12.5 US Mens. Also, a little disappointed there is no WIDE sizes.  Note: the "Try Before you Buy" only has certain sizes. I will still buy the next size larger & return these.

I have had these shoes for 2 years. I consider myself a moderate runner and have put approx. 2,200 miles on this pair. The Xero HFS was my first foray into “barefoot” shoes. I have always preferred a more flexible, light, minimalist shoe. Beforehand I ran in shoes like Nike free runners, or adidas swift’s.  Out of the box these shoes are incredibly flexible and very wide when compared to typical running shoes. They do not constrain your feet in the slightest. The lack of cushion on the sole takes a little time to get used to. I have a partial gravel driveway. Within the first few days I returned home from a run and landed on a single rock, leaving a nasty bruise. You learn really quickly to be mindful of your strides when wearing barefoot shoes.  The treads seem to be nearly indestructible. Every prior running shoe I've worn would be completely bald around the midpoint within a year. These have displayed very minimal wear around the ball of my foot. There are however some wear issues regarding other parts…  The top end of these separated very early around 3 months. This was first displayed on the inner side of the shoe around the ball area. I assume this is because that area experiences the most flex. At first it was very minor and remained this way until I had them for around a year. At this point the separation became more severe, eventually displaying on to the other (outer) side of the shoe. After 2 years I had to retire them as a hole started to form in between the top and the sole where they seperated.  I am a little disappointed that the sole started to separate so quickly. All of my other shoes would eventually get retired because the treads would wear out. However, these do hold the personal record for longest service life. The treads simply don't die. They are so incredibly comfortable after adapting that I can't go back to regular shoes. The unconstrained flexibility has ruined me. Putting on work boots or normal tennis shoes feels akin to wearing a vice after 2 years wearing Xero’s. If the tops didn't separate so badly they would be the perfect shoe.

Wore normally for 3 months. Walking plus running on concrete daily. After 3 months noticed seam coming undone. I've been wearing my nikes for years and they never got holes. Very disappointed for the price these shoes should last for years. Would like refund or something, this is a waste of my money.
Shoes fit perfect and loved the color. Unfortunately due to an injury I was not able to keep them.
These are really uncomfortable.  I thought they would get better after breaking them in.

评论用户: Fit horrible, and not that comfortable
评论概述: Great shoe but started falling apart in toes.
评论详情: Had these shoes for about 4 months. Got close to 100 miles out of them and they started to fall apart in on the edge of the soles. I reached out to xero to get them replaced and they got back to me. Glad they got back to me, and can get them replaced under warranty

I have been wearing these shoes for all of my exercise sessions over the last few months of ownership.  Overall I am pretty impressed and I am happy with them because I desperately needed new exercise footwear.  I could not find anything to complain about with these shoes, and that is the highest possible award I can give the product.

评论概述: These don't feel like the HFS 1
评论详情: I own 4 pairs of the HFS 1 Xero shoes.  They are my favorite shoe.  These HFS 2s feel very different from the HFS1 and hurt my feet and knees.  The sole feels much stiffer and my foot can't move around as freely.  The look and build quality are excellent though, so if they are comfortable to you I recommend them.  I was just expecting something that felt like the HFS 1.

评论概述: Comfortable and light, .5 to 1 full size up
评论详情: Finally a shoe that fits my wide feet right. My toes don’t feel like being squished together. The shoes are breathable and insanely light, feels like you’re just wearing socks. I also like that the mid/outsoles are flat. I do get that they are pricier and may not be the most flattering/ stylish shoes but at least they feel good on my feet. Oh yeah, I wish that the midsoles are a bit more grippy.  I read online that some people took awhile to get used to the shoes. However, that was not the case for me. They were pretty comfy for me since I first used them. Although, I am quite worried that the midsoles might run thin/worn out quick since they are pretty thin already. Well, I do hope that they last me long.

This is an update to my original review.  The first pair of shoes I recived quickly got some damage on the tongue lace-holder, and the shoe didn't fit quite well as another pair I had before.  After contacting directly the vendor I got the shoes replaced very quickly. Great service!
I just donated all my running shoes and sneakers after wearing these for several weeks.  Xero's are the only brand of shoe you'll find in my closet moving forward!  Thank you, Team Xero!

I have been wearing these for about 6 months now.  They are incredible.  They are so light weight.  The zero drop has been really nice.  there is a removable cushion that is zero drop as well inside.  The toe box being more rectangular with round corners vs a round toe box is superior for not cramping toes, and causing toes to grow cramped.  They are breathable and don't get very hot either. I wore them all throughout the Louisiana hot summer. I find the soles are lasting longer than my Vans or Superga that i wore previously.  I wear these everyday.  I bought a second pait in white to have when i wear shorts. I wear size 13 according to a Brannock Device, and thats the size i got, and the fit great.  I wore these for a week in colorado and a week hiking in moab utah.
Exactly what I was looking for with an extremely thin, level sole with just enough support and high quality construction. Very true to size fit as well.

评论概述: Daily drivers - running miles or running errands, they feel great and keep my feet healthy
评论详情: They take some getting used to if you've never worn low-drop shoes before. On my 2nd pair, and I've been a consistent user for almost 2 years

This pair of running shoes are so lightweight that it feels like you are walking barefoot.  The non-elevated and low-to-the-ground heel allows for proper posture, balance, and agility.  The shoes are also very flexible that prevents any creases after long use.  The toe-box is very spacious, so it is ideal for people with wider feet.  The shoes are true to its size so please order regular size. The price could have been little bit less when compared to other brand’s running shoes.

评论概述: Very true to fit and size
评论详情: They are a very good shoe for people who want to leave their narrow toe box shoes

评论概述: Great shoes, but not great wear
评论详情: These are extremely comfortable for people with flat feet, and while I was told from many reviews that my feet will have to adjust, they simply didn’t need to as I was fine from the beginning. Whenever I go on walks with normal shoes my feet would cramp and I could only walk for 20 minutes. With these shoes, I can walk forever, but this has more to do with the flat feet working with barefoot/zero drop style than the Xero shoes themselves.  I went with Xero because they seemed like a legitimate brand that would stand behind their shoes. For this reason, I was willing to pay the extra money compared to others on Amazon. At this point, I have two pairs of their shoes, and they have a warranty for 5000 miles. I have put 1000 miles on the HFS shoes and you can see that they are severely worn and versatility is a little questionable depending on surface. The Prio have no more than 500 on them and the right shoe already has similar balding. There are runners claiming 4,000-6,000 miles on similar shoes costing $30-50 on here.  I have revised my rating to show that they do honor their warranty, but likely need a better email system.  I wasn’t pleased about a lack of response, but it turns out there support emails go to spam and they have in fact reached out. They have offered me their 5000 warranty, giving me the discount. I love the feel of the shoes, but I really wish they’d invest in better sole technology.

These fit amazingly well. The shape of the box as they call it. The front of the foot is just perfect. It’s shaped like a real foot, and not some missile shape that so many other shoes are designed like. So the shape is amazing, and the material is really, really excellent. It’s a mesh on the upper, which really lets your foot breathe. The bottom has a tire tread sole with a stiff flat support. I really like that there is no elevation in the heel. The shoe weighs so little it’s almost as if you feel like they’re not even there. Some people one may want to have more cushioning for the foot but for the serious runner this feeling that you’re almost running in your bare feet is extremely comfortable. There’s no variance in your gait or stride. Everything with this shoe feels so incredibly natural. I think these may be the best shoes I’ve ever owned. Highly recommend.

评论概述: These shoes won't give you moral highground points
评论详情: For the price they have, I thought these slippers, yea, they're slippers let's be real about it. Thought they'd last through thousands of miles on trails. The 40 dollar "barefoot shoes" lasted through alot of torture. -The insoles slip while walking. I tossed them.trash. -shoelace eyelet tore. Haven't had them long enough to start using them on the trails. -narrow. For barefoot shoes I need width for the barefoot feel. -expensive. I mean, I thought they'd feel waayy better than they do. Not talking about the sole, but the flexibility, durability, grip on sole. Not worth it.

These running shoes are reasonably comfortable and look decent but at this price point there are a lot of name brand shoes to compete with. For instance, I recently purchased a pair of Asics on Amazon for half the price of these that are just as comfortable and look great.

评论概述: Didn't last more than two months.
评论详情: These shoes feel great, but within a week of wearing them, I already started seeing tears in the thin fabric mesh. One month in, I have huge rips and gashes in the super fragile mesh upper. Then, about a week ago (a little less than two months after I started wearing them) The V-Strap lace-loop that attaches to the sole of the shoe completely ripped out. The right shoe now isn't wearable. I've gotten more use out of a $38.00 pair of no-name Amazon barefoot shoes, and I am extremely disappointed in the quality of these Xeros. I can't recommend them at all.

评论概述: Never going back to regular shoes! Didn't realize how hard I was stomping my feet before.
评论详情: I wore them to work and my feet were killing me for the first 3ish weeks, but eventually, I got used to them and my plantar fasciitis went away. No more heel drag either. I've been wearing them every day everywhere for the last 8 months and don't wear any of my other shoes anymore unless I'm playing basketball. All my other shoes are no longer comfortable. These barefoot shoes are the most comfortable shoes. They are lightweight and feel so natural and flexible. I can wear them all day. My feet have gotten so much stronger too. I may have to get a new pair at some point because they are so rocked and stained.

I was having problems with pain when I walked . I was wearing hoka's ! My foot Dr. told me I was wearing the wrong shoe! She said I need zero drop shoes ! These xero shoes are so great ! I ordered another!!!
This is true to size and looks really durable. The reason why i took 1 star out is because it's got that weird look in the front. It's a little wider than how it's supposed to be.

评论概述: Look and feel great - Minimalist but still structured
评论详情: I started wearing and enjoying zero drop shoes when I was running a lot of endurance races. I don't actively train for the distances anymore, but I do enjoy the improved contact with the ground and natural feel of a zero drop/minimalist shoe .  Xero makes a great example of this style of footwear. The shoe has a wide toebox allowing for more natural feel and movement, along with a thin but protective base that gives feedback from the ground without feeling like a ... thick sock.  Extremely lightweight, and well built - They have the immediate feel of quality. *I ordered my normal size and they are a touch snug, right out of the box so if you are between sizes, I would encourage you to go a half size up.

评论概述: Natural feel running shoe - break them in slowly
评论详情: These are very comfortable running shoes. My husband found he was able to have his toes fully lay flat inside the shoe with no pinching. Whilst the sole is thin there is just about the right amount of cushioning to provide support and comfort without sacrificing the bare foot running fell of the terrain underfoot.  If you have not run in these types of shoes before make the transition slowly until you get used to them. They will make your calves ache due to the slight adjustment in running to adopt a more fore foot barefoot running position.  Materials used and finish are of a high quality. Lots of info on the shoes themselves on the shoebox they come stored in.
Started using them for work. Not disappointed
Good quality running shoes. Lightweight. Durable. Very comfortable. Lots of toe room. Soles have great traction. They are stylish and bright blue in color.

The - Xero Shoes Men's HFS II Running Shoes - Zero Drop, Lightweight & Barefoot Feel – are very comfortable shoes. I’ve been wearing them around the house and out and about for the last two days. With some other brands of running shoes, my pinky toe will get pushed up and under the toe next to it and it can get rather painful. There is enough room in the toe box of these running shoes so that is not the case here.  I do have a somewhat high instep so when first wearing these shoes the laces felt slightly bothersome on the top of my foot. I loosened up the laces quite a bit which seems to have alleviated any discomfort but this made the laces too short and a little difficult to tie.  One other thing to note, the color of these shoes is darker than they appear to be on my computer screen but they are still attractive. Other than that, I really like these shoes.  I normally wear a size 9 shoe which is what I had ordered. The fit is fine.

评论概述: Unique design and great fitting running shoes that are very comfortable to wear!
评论详情: As someone with large feet (size 14) and wide feet I am always looking for shoes that can fit my feet.  I have tried different types and styles and not all of them fit as well as others.  I came across these Xero Shoes Men's HFS II Running Shoes - Zero Drop, Lightweight & Barefoot Feel and decided to try them.  I find them to be very comfortable after wearing them for a few hours.  I like how they have a box toe at the front which gives my wide foot a lot of room.  I like how they are very lightweight and almost feel like I am not wearing anything yet give me some solid support especially my heel.  I like how they look great cool with the use of grey and black colors and go with most of my shorts, jeans and shirts.  With all this being said, I'm pretty happy with these shoes and how well they fit and how comfortable they are and give them a 5 out of 5 star rating.
My husband is obsessed with them.  Material, support are all a 10 out of 10
Get it?  Had these shoes for over 2 years, daily wears, plenty of weight lifting and hiking. I'm a heal-toe runner, so I don't run in them. I love them though. Heading back for more now

Falling apart less than 6 months in. Only hand washed twice. Owned 5 prior pair of zero HFS shoes only get 18 months out normally but this pair was gone in only 5 months of wear and spent over 2 months to get warranty claim processed but they no longer respond.

评论概述: Transition sucked but my feet feel stronger
评论详情: I tried Vibrams before but felt silly and I couldnt ever bring myself to wear them fulltime. When I got these I did that thing your not supposed to and full switched to these as my only shoes. It sucked pretty bad for the first 2 weeks. Pretty much like walking on concrete barefoot the entire time. Now my feet feel stronger and I only ever get tired foot pain after a busy long week.  I would rate these higher but I tried wearing barefoot once or twice but the shoe rubs on my middle toe joint. Never seems to be a problem while wearing socks though.

评论概述: I Finally Found My Favorite Running Shoes!
评论详情: For years I had been purchasing different minimalist shoes, some expensive and some cheap, looking for a comfortable road running shoe that would last more than a couple of months before wearing through the sole. I run a little over 21 miles a week. I had "settled" on another brand of minimalist running shoes because they would last from four to five months. However, the quality began to wane badly, and the last pair I purchased didn't even last 2 months. My wife saw an ad for Xero shoes with a 5,000 mile guarantee and suggested them to me.  Wow, not only are these the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn, but they swallowed my running route whole and spit out the gravel! At last, I have found the shoes that have eluded me all these years.

评论概述: Zero support and doesn't contour to foot.
评论详情: It is really flat. It has zero drop and is very lightweight, but offers no support for arch or ankle. Even with an arch insole insert it doesn't feel good on my foot.

These shoes are everything I wanted. They are exactly as advertised. It feels somewhat like bare feet, but they’re still covered from the elements. They are extremely comfortable and feel almost like slippers. Usually I’m pining to get my shoes off after work, but these shoes are so comfortable that I hardly notice them.

I have tried Xero shoes several times and have never had a good experience. This model changes everything. There are a few minor things I don’t like, but over all the best minimalist running shoe I’ve owned since Inov8 changed the 195s to be complete junk in 2010s.

I like these shoes ! They are almost too wide for me but they lace up snuggly and make it OK. The shoelaces are like heavy parachute cord… i wish all my shoes had them. Shoes are very light and i enjoy wearing for casual and balance/agility types of work outs. Packaging was all recyclable and easy to breakdown.
Love these shoes with a passion. Look great. Feel great.

The ultra-flat zero-drop shoe thing is now only a holdover from a fad 15 years ago. All actual development and innovation has ceased. In which case, what is the difference between a $100+ Xero or Vivo Barefoot shoe and the Whitin shoes ($45) available on Amazon? About $100+...that's all. It would be wonderful for someone to make an actual zero-drop cross-trainer - that has enough cushion to sustain 3-mile runs as well as lift and jump in...but this is not it.

评论概述: Highly recommend for comfort and grip.
评论详情: Went half a size larger than Xero's hiking boots and they fit great. Very comfy and soft; I don't even always wear socks with these, just slip them on. Also, on flat surfaces the grip is off the charts. So much so that when new they squeak a bit whenever you come to a stop. Just be aware that they are true barefoot shoes and have a miniscule amount of cushion and zero support - which is great for me.

评论概述: Most comfortable shoes I've had in ages
评论详情: Absolutely amazing shoe. Very comfortable and light weight. I'm a big fan of minimalist footwear and this is exactly what I've been looking for. It took a few weeks to get used to, but I'm using these for casual use, running a few miles, and lifting weights.
Soles don’t stay put.  As I’m walking or running, slowly move back in the shoe creating annoying gap down in the toe box.  Very distracting and messes up my movements

评论概述: A Perfect Run demands Perfect shoes
评论详情: I immediately loved the quality of the materials used and the overall design. They are very comfortable and I my feet feel very connected to the floor surface. I can finally replace my old narrow running shoes and let my feet “breath” While running.
